ing: 1 (12 ounce) package firm tofu, drained and cut into 1/2-inch cubes
1 head leafy dark green lettuce -  torn, washed, and spun dry
1/4 red onion, thinly sliced for garnish (or as preferred)
des: "This fresh and satisfying vegetarian salad keeps well and never fails to please. Wholesome, delicious, and company-worthy. A very pretty salad that can be made up in a hurry. Makes great leftovers and improves with longer marination. If marinated tofu is stored separately, this makes a fantastic and filling boxed lunch choice. Try adding a can of drained, flaked white tuna for variety."
ins:
Whisk olive oil, vinegar, salt, basil, pepper, and oregano together in a bowl.
Put tofu cubes in a large bowl. Pour marinade over tofu; add capers. Marinate tofu, stirring occasionally, for at least 10 minutes.
Combine lettuce and tomatoes in a separate large bowl. Pour tofu mixture over lettuce and toss. Garnish with red onion.
